title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. The view returns to its default size.
EB: The CVS repository view should stay maximized even when switching perspectives. It should retain its maximized state.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the Resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective and observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
